entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
